name: Flatline (Slyze Games)
description:
Hotline Miami Esque Shooter.

Plot: Your twin has been involved in some gang related stuff, he got fucked up. Now you're supposed to Keep him alive while he is being operated.

This game is No way near finished, but due to limited time during the jam, I couldn't finish the game, i might end up finishing the game later.

Due to the game being unfinished, There is no win or lose condition
